meanings.definition: A mixture of hydrocarbons obtained from petroleum, used as a solvent.
meanings.sent1: I used ligroin to clean the grease off the engine parts.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used ligroin to dissolve the stubborn residue.
meanings.sent3: The spilled ligroin accidentally cleaned the entire garage floor!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like ligroin, effortlessly dissolving any tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The smell of ligroin lingered in the air, a reminder of its powerful cleaning properties.

meanings.definition: To clean or dissolve with ligroin.
meanings.sent1: She ligroined the paint off the old furniture.
meanings.sent2: The workers ligroin the machinery parts for maintenance.
meanings.sent3: He ligroined the stain away, revealing the pristine wood underneath.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to ligroin away the memories, leaving only faint traces behind.
meanings.sent5: The solution ligroined through the grime, revealing a sparkling surface beneath.
